gw.cc.policy.entity

Interface LocationBasedRU

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RiskUnit
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BuildingRU, GeneralLiabilityRU, InlandMarineRU, LocationMiscRU, PropertyRU, WCCovEmpRU

    public interface LocationBasedRU
extends RiskUnit
    LocationBasedRU A RiskUnit that has a (Policy) Location associated with it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Building addNewBuilding()
      Creates a building on the RiskUnit's Location and sets it as this RiskUnit's building.
      ClassCode addNewClassCode()
      Creates a classcode on the RiskUnit's Policy and sets it as this RiskUnit's ClassCode.
      PolicyLocation getProperty() 
      Key getPropertyID()
      Gets the ID of the PolicyLocation for the RiskUnit.
      void removeBuilding()
      Sets the RiskUnit's building reference to null and retires the Building if no other RiskUnit refers to it.
      void removeClassCode()
      Sets the RiskUnit's classcode reference to null and retires the ClassCode if no other RiskUnit refers to it.
      void setPolicyLocation(PolicyLocation value)
      Sets the value of the PolicyLocation field.
      void setProperty(PolicyLocation value)
      Sets the PolicyLocation
      void setPropertyID(Key value)
      Sets the PolicyLocation of the RiskUnit.

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.cc.policy.entity.RiskUnit

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyID

        Key getPropertyID()
        Gets the ID of the PolicyLocation for the RiskUnit.

      • setPropertyID

        void setPropertyID(Key value)
        Sets the PolicyLocation of the RiskUnit.
        Parameters:
        value -

      • removeBuilding

        void removeBuilding()
        Sets the RiskUnit's building reference to null and retires the Building if no other RiskUnit refers to it.

      • addNewBuilding

        Building addNewBuilding()
        Creates a building on the RiskUnit's Location and sets it as this RiskUnit's building. Throws an exception if the RiskUnit has no Location or if the RiskUnit already has a building.
        Returns:
        the newly created Building

      • removeClassCode

        void removeClassCode()
        Sets the RiskUnit's classcode reference to null and retires the ClassCode if no other RiskUnit refers to it.

      • addNewClassCode

        ClassCode addNewClassCode()
        Creates a classcode on the RiskUnit's Policy and sets it as this RiskUnit's ClassCode. Throws an exception if the RiskUnit has no Policy or if the RiskUnit already has a classcode.
        Returns:
        the newly created classcode

      • setPolicyLocation

        void setPolicyLocation(PolicyLocation value)
        Sets the value of the PolicyLocation field.
